name: prep-sanger-qc.0.1.3.0
body: * Update `Sanger bas_stats.pl script` to `Sanger bam_stats tool` in description (#33)

name: sanger-wgs-variant-caller.2.1.0-9
body:
set pu and pi as optional parameters
use better default values

name: prep-sanger-qc.0.1.2.0
body:
add description, metrics and files_in_tgz field into extra_info
disable aggregated bas_stats extraction

name: prep-sanger-supplement.0.1.2.0
body:
* fixed a bug for removing unwanted files when it's not timing supplement
* changed  `files` to `files_in_tgz`
* added a new test to cover supplements from BRASS and ASCAT

name: generate-bas.0.2.1.0
body: * added tumour_normal params to be explicit, which helps later steps in generation correct SONG payload

name: sanger-wgs-variant-caller.2.1.0-6
body:
- add `nf` version of `sanger-variant-caller`
- add option to disable step of `pindel` and `caveman` annotation
- fix a potential error in `analysisWGS`, should build the cache before the real parallel blocks starting
- add -r to `ln` when create symbolic links
- set HOME to be PWD in perl script

name: sanger-wxs-variant-caller.3.1.6-3
body:
- add nf version of sanger-variant-caller
- add option to disable step of pindel and caveman annotation
- fix a potential error in analysisWGS, should build the cache before the real parallel blocks starting
- add -r to ln when create symbolic links

name: repack-sanger-results.0.2.0.0
body: Repack sanger results to different tgz files.

name: caveman-vcf-fix.0.1.0.0
body: Fix the bug in CaVEMan that output none variant (ref = alt) in VCF.

name: prep-sanger-qc.0.1.0.0
body:
prepare qc_metrics in sanger variant calling pipeline:
- bas_metrics per sample (normal/tumour)
- contamination_metrics per sample (normal/tumour)
- ascat_metrics per donor
- genotyped_gender_metrics per donor

name: prep-sanger-supplement.0.1.0.0
body:
prepare supplements in sanger variant calling pipeline:
* SNV from CaVEMan
* Indel from Pindel
* CNV from ASCAT
* SV from BRASS
